question.title: Puzzles (20%)
question.description: You are given some puzzles that are represented as 2D boolean arrays. Each puzzle has the size of either 2x3 or 3x2 (i.e., two rows with three columns or three rows with two columns).
question.note: (true is displayed as *; false is displayed as .)

methods.name: printPuzzle
methods.description: Complete the method printPuzzle so that this method can print the puzzle with true displayed as '*', false is displayed as '.'.

methods.name: rightRotatePuzzle
methods.description: Complete the method rightRotatePuzzle so that this method returns a puzzle that has been rotated to RIGHT for 90 degrees.

methods.name: leftRotatePuzzle
methods.description: Complete the method leftRotatePuzzle so that this method returns a puzzle that has been rotated to LEFT for 90 degrees.

methods.name: areSame
methods.description: We define two puzzles as identical if they are the same after some rotations. Complete the method areSame which returns true if they are identical; return false otherwise.

expectedOutput: Is puzzle 1 and puzzle 2 the same? true
Is puzzle 1 and puzzle 2 the same? false
The puzzle should not be rotated or modified after the methods

areSame: for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++, p = rotateRightPuzzle(p))
runApp: boolean[][] puzzle1 = {{true, true, false}, {false, true, true}};
boolean[][] puzzle3 = {{false, false, false}, {true, false, false}};
System.out.printf("Is puzzle 1 and puzzle 2 the same? %b\n", areSame(puzzle1, puzzle2));
System.out.printf("Is puzzle 1 and puzzle 3 the same? %b\n", areSame(puzzle1, puzzle3));
System.out.println("The puzzle should not be rotated or modified after the methods");

methods.areSame: public boolean areSame(boolean[][] p1, boolean[][] p2) {}
runApp: boolean[][] puzzle1 = {{true, true, false}, {false, true, true}};
boolean[][] puzzle3 = {{false, false, false}, {true, false, false}};
System.out.printf("Is puzzle 1 and puzzle 2 the same? %b\n", areSame(puzzle1, puzzle2));
System.out.printf("Is puzzle 1 and puzzle 3 the same? %b\n", areSame(puzzle1, puzzle3));
System.out.println("The puzzle should not be rotated or modified after the methods");
